pre.div: 87 <appendix>Multiple VK_* in one definition are replaced same value.</appendix>
165 <appendix>Shift_L to Shift_L (if no other modifiers pressed)</appendix>
168 <appendix>Shift_R to Shift_R+A (if no other modifiers pressed)</appendix>
169 <appendix>Command_L+Command_R to Command_L+Command_R (if no other modifiers pressed)</appendix>
177 <autogen>--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::COMMAND_R, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_R | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::COMMAND_R, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L</autogen>
194 <autogen>--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::B, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::B, KeyCode::C, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::D, KeyCode::P, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L</autogen>
195 <autogen>--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::C, KeyCode::JIS_KANA, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::I, KeyCode::JIS_EISUU, KeyCode::U</autogen>
196 <autogen>--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::B, KeyCode::B, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::C, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::D</autogen>
197 <autogen>--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::D, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::A, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::F, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L</autogen>

198 <autogen>--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::E, ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::H, KeyCode::T, KeyCode::T, KeyCode::P, KeyCode::SEMICOLON, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::SLASH, KeyCode::SLASH, KeyCode::P, KeyCode::Q, KeyCode::R, KeyCode::S, KeyCode::DOT, KeyCode::O, KeyCode::R, KeyCode::G, KeyCode::SLASH, KeyCode::M, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::C, KeyCode::O, KeyCode::S, KeyCode::X, KeyCode::SLASH, KeyCode::K, KeyCode::E, KeyCode::Y, KeyCode::R, KeyCode::E, KeyCode::M, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::P, KeyCode::KEY_4, KeyCode::M, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::C, KeyCode::B, KeyCode::O, KeyCode::O, KeyCode::K, KeyCode::SLASH</autogen>
199 <autogen>--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::F, KeyCode::CAPSLOCK, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::S, KeyCode::D, KeyCode::CAPSLOCK</autogen>
205 <appendix>Shift_L to A,Shift_L+S,D (if no other modifiers pressed)</appendix>
207 <autogen>--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::SHIFT_L, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::S, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::D</autogen>
213 <appendix>// This has a issue with key repeat.</appendix>
214 <appendix>// In key repeat, CapsLock status is not changed.</appendix>
236 <appendix>(Turn on all settings. The settings labeled "skipped" will be ignored.)</appendix>
301 <!-- NumLock is a special key. When we press "A" key with holding NumLock key, there is no key down event occurred -->
302 <!-- Therefore we cannot change NumLock to Modifier -->
304 <autogen>--ConsumerToKey-- ConsumerKeyCode::VOLUME_DOWN, VK_COMMAND, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::S, KeyCode::D, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::F, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::G</autogen>
336 <appendix>A to Shift_L (When type only, send Space) (Standard)</appendix>
337 <appendix>Option_L to Shift_L (When type only, send Space) (Modifier)</appendix>
338 <appendix>Control+B to Shift_L (When type only, send Space) (Key+Modifier)</appendix>
339 <appendix>C to Shift_L (When type only, send Space) + [KeyRepeat]</appendix>
340 <appendix>Command+D to Shift_L (When type only, send Control_L+F) + [KeyRepeat]</appendix>
342 <appendix>F to Shift_L (When type only, send CapsLock)</appendix>
343 <appendix>G to Shift_L (When type only, send A,B,Shift_L+C,Control_L+B)</appendix>
344 <appendix>H to Shift_L (When type only, send A,B,Shift_L+C,Control_L+B) + [KeyRepeat]</appendix>
345 <appendix>I to Shift_L (When type only, send Option_L)</appendix>
346 <appendix>J to Shift_L+Option_L (When type only, send Space)</appendix>
347 <appendix>Command_R to Shift_L (When type only without other modifiers, send Space)</appendix>
356 <autogen>--KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::G, KeyCode::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::B, KeyCode::C, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::B, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L</autogen>
357 <autogen>--KeyOverlaidModifierWithRepeat-- KeyCode::H, KeyCode::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::B, KeyCode::C, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::B, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L</autogen>
364 <appendix>Command_R to Command_R (When type only without other modifiers, send Space)</appendix>
377 <appendix>Escape to Tab (+ Holding Escape to Space)</appendix>
378 <appendix>Tab to A,S,Control_L+D,F (+ Holding Tab to Q,W,Shift_L+E,R)</appendix>
379 <appendix>Option+Shift_R to Return (+ Holding Option+Shift_R to Space)</appendix>
380 <appendix>Shift+A to Option_L+B (+ Holding Shift+A to Command_L+Return)</appendix>
381 <appendix>Control+B to Option_L+B,C (+ Holding Control+B to Space)</appendix>
382 <!-- Note: Use KeyCode::VK_NONE as a separator of parameters -->

384 <autogen>--HoldingKeyToKey-- KeyCode::TAB, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::S, KeyCode::D, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::F, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::Q, KeyCode::W, KeyCode::E, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::R</autogen>
386 <autogen>--HoldingKeyToKey-- KeyCode::A, VK_SHIFT, KeyCode::B, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::RETURN, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L</autogen>
387 <autogen>--HoldingKeyToKey-- KeyCode::B, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::B, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, KeyCode::C, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::SPACE</autogen>
404 <autogen>--DoublePressModifier-- KeyCode::B, VK_SHIFT, KeyCode::CONTROL_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::S, KeyCode::D, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L</autogen>
491 <appendix>(X+C to Return with Option::RAW (== to Space))</appendix>
497 <autogen>--SimultaneousKeyPresses-- KeyCode::S, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::S, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::J</autogen>
498 <autogen>--SimultaneousKeyPresses-- KeyCode::D, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::S, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::D, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::F</autogen>
667 <autogen>--PointingButtonToKey-- PointingButton::RIGHT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::B, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::C, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L</autogen>
691 <appendix>(B becomes D when notsave.sample is active)</appendix>
714 <appendix>Volume Mute to B if application == TERMINAL (ConsumerToKey)</appendix>
715 <appendix>Volume Mute to C if application != TERMINAL (ConsumerToKey)</appendix>
755 <appendix>B to 2 if samples_config_mode1 or samples_config_mode2 == active</appendix>
757 <appendix>B to 4 if samples_config_mode1 and samples_config_mode2 != active</appendix>
944 <!-- We need to set both JAPANESE_HIRAGANA and JAPANESE -->
1041 <appendix>A to B if Command_L or Option_L is pressed.</appendix>
1047 <appendix>A to C unless Shift_L or Control_L is pressed.</appendix>
1065 <appendix>B to D if "Control_L+Option_L" or "Command_L+Option_L" is pressed.</appendix>
1070 <appendix>B to E unless "COMMAND_L+SHIFT_L" or "COMMAND_L+SHIFT_R" is pressed.</appendix>
1087 <appendix>C to F if Shift_L is pressed. (And no other modifiers are pressed.)</appendix>
1164 <appendix>Use F as ModifierFlag::EXTRA5 (When type only, send Space)</appendix>
1188 <appendix>Use Q to Force Lock on Command_L</appendix>
1189 <appendix>Use W to Force Lock on Command_R</appendix>
1190 <appendix>Use E to Force Lock on Control_L</appendix>
1191 <appendix>Use R to Force Lock on Control_R</appendix>
1192 <appendix>Use T to Force Lock on Fn</appendix>
1193 <appendix>Use Y to Force Lock on Option_L</appendix>
1194 <appendix>Use U to Force Lock on Option_R</appendix>
1195 <appendix>Use I to Force Lock on Shift_L</appendix>
1196 <appendix>Use O to Force Lock on Shift_R</appendix>
1197 <appendix>Use A to Force Lock off Command_L</appendix>
1198 <appendix>Use S to Force Lock off Command_R</appendix>
1199 <appendix>Use D to Force Lock off Control_L</appendix>
1200 <appendix>Use F to Force Lock off Control_R</appendix>
1201 <appendix>Use G to Force Lock off Fn</appendix>
1202 <appendix>Use H to Force Lock off Option_L</appendix>
1203 <appendix>Use J to Force Lock off Option_R</appendix>
1204 <appendix>Use K to Force Lock off Shift_L</appendix>
1205 <appendix>Use L to Force Lock off Shift_R</appendix>
1206 <appendix>Use Z to Force Lock off All</appendix>
1244 <appendix>Use Q to Force Lock on ModifierFlag::EXTRA1</appendix>
1245 <appendix>Use W to Force Lock on ModifierFlag::EXTRA2</appendix>
1246 <appendix>Use E to Force Lock on ModifierFlag::EXTRA3</appendix>
1247 <appendix>Use R to Force Lock on ModifierFlag::EXTRA4</appendix>
1248 <appendix>Use T to Force Lock on ModifierFlag::EXTRA5</appendix>
1249 <appendix>Use A to Force Lock off ModifierFlag::EXTRA1</appendix>
1250 <appendix>Use S to Force Lock off ModifierFlag::EXTRA2</appendix>
1251 <appendix>Use D to Force Lock off ModifierFlag::EXTRA3</appendix>
1252 <appendix>Use F to Force Lock off ModifierFlag::EXTRA4</appendix>
1253 <appendix>Use G to Force Lock off ModifierFlag::EXTRA5</appendix>
1370 <appendix>Use A to toggle Complete Vi Mode</appendix>
1371 <appendix>Use S to turn on Complete Vi Mode</appendix>
1380 <appendix>Command_R to Command_R (When type only, send send KANA/EISUU (toggle))</appendix>
